title: Schefter Meets The Simpsons
description:
Adam starts off this week's episode with a bit of breaking COVID news that hits close to home. After that, he looks ahead as we enter Week 17, with what we can expect from certain players and matchups. Then, Adam is joined by two men who wrote and produced an episode of the Simpsons where Adam is a guest star! Lastly, Adam sits down with the founder of Champion Causes, an organization that helps donate fantasy football winnings to top Fantasy players' charities.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
